## PaginatorBuilderOptions.keyMap property

Custom key bindings for paginator navigation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
keyMap?: KeyMap$1;
```

## Remarks

Override default key bindings for navigating between pages. By default, the paginator responds to: - Next page: `pgdown`<!-- -->, `right`<!-- -->, `l` - Previous page: `pgup`<!-- -->, `left`<!-- -->, `h`
